name: OOX: Buy Now
title: Buy NFT from Auction
description: Buy an NFT directly from an auction at the buy-now price (if available).

inputs.name: Auction ID
inputs.description: The ID of the auction to buy from.

inputs.name: NFT Type
inputs.description: The token identifier of the NFT being sold.

inputs.name: NFT Nonce
inputs.description: The nonce of the NFT being sold.

inputs.name: Payment
inputs.description: Payment amount in the accepted payment token.
